Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Ocellatin-PT6 (natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals, UCLL1a)
Sequence Information.Source: Skin Secretion, dorsal,Leptodactylus pustulatus, South America

Literature Information.Literature: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of THE PEPTIDE shows 96.9% similarity toOcellatin-PT7.Activity:  Originally discovered in 2015, it has leishmanicidal activity (IC50 12.7 uM)(Oliveira M et al., 2016).Antibacteria? Weakly active against E.coli ATCC 25922 (MIC 120 uM), K.pneumoniae ATCC 700603 (MIC >240 uM), S.choleraesuis ATCC 14028 (MIC >240 uM), and S.aureus ATCC 29313 (MIC >240 uM).

Literature Information.Title: Characterization and Biological Activities of Ocellatin Peptides from the Skin Secretion of the Frog Leptodactylus pustulatus
